root.name: strokeCap()

example.code: strokeWeight(12.0) strokeCap(ROUND) line(20, 30, 80, 30) strokeCap(SQUARE) line(20, 50, 80, 50) strokeCap(PROJECT) line(20, 70, 80, 70)

root.description: Sets the style for rendering line endings. These ends are either squared, extended, or rounded, each of which specified with the corresponding parameters: SQUARE, PROJECT, and ROUND. The default cap is ROUND.
